ygData.msgSnippet: Hades/Anubis/Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Unitron/Double ... respecitve mythos:: Kill them! ::Hades fired off three laser blasts at sub-commander

From: KSLawdogg@...

Hades/Anubis/Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Unitron/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector:

::Hades and Anubis ran out of the the ship, both the lords of death in their 
respecitve mythos::
"Kill them!" ::Hades fired off three laser blasts at sub-commander Rampage's 
chest from his laser rifle::

"Join death!" ::Anubis, the Jackle-God, yelled, raising his plasma rifle and 
firing a single plasma blast at Rampage's left knee::

-----------

::Injector and Manterror looked to each other, and where they thought Double 
Punch was, at hearing Zardus' words::
"Truce?  What Truce?"
"No one told me we had a truce."
::Double Punch's voice could be heard:: "He attacked us first.  That's my 
story." ::He fired a energy signature seeking missile of at Zardus, 
chuckling::

::Unitron was now standing, he leapt into the air as he saw the missiles, 
landing in front of Double Punch, shoving the rifles forward until he felt 
something, and pulled the triggers down several times until the lasers 
pierced into Double Punch's body, the scorpion's stealth mode no longer 
functioning, his body dropping to the ground near dead::

"Slag!" ::Manterror yelled, firing an ion disk, Unitron ducking, his back 
being grazed, and leapt forward, digging his inwardly pointing horns into 
Manterror's chest, twisting them around, Injector firing two stinger 
missiles, the force ripping Unitron out of Manterror painfully::

::Firing two more missiles, Unitron didn't get up, the stinger missiles doing 
their damage::
::The fuzor looked around::
"Slag!  Manterror, I'm always carrying your fat ass around!  Why don't you 
win a battle for once!?  OR at least stay standing and carry me to base!" ::A 
swift kick to Manterror made him shake::  ::Putting both Manterror and Double 
Punch over his shoulder, Injector slowly, slowly, slowly headed for the 
Predacon base, whining about how heavy the two Predacons were::

-------------------

::The Oblitercons pulled back at Zardus' order, saying to themselves what a 
fool he was, on their way home they picked up Pyro, and headed for the Middle 
East::

=========

::Nemesis slowly woke up:: "I...don't...want...to...go...to...school today 
mommy...I want...to...stay...home...and...bake...Maximals...with...you 
all...day long..." ::he passed out once more::
